Docs.summary: Represents a specific JSON value within a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonElement Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a JsonElement that can be safely stored beyond the lifetime of the original .
Docs.returns: A JsonElement that can be safely stored beyond the lifetime of the original .

remarks.format: If this <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonElement> is itself the output of a previous call to `Clone` or a value contained within another <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonElement> that was the output of a previous call to `Clone`, this method results in no additional memory allocation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetBytesFromBase64() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the element as a byte array.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float64 GetDouble() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the current JSON number as a .
Docs.returns: The current JSON number as a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This method does not parse the contents of a JSON string value.
On .NET Core, this method returns <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> for values larger than <xref:System.Double.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and it returns <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> for values smaller than <xref:System.Double.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

Docs.exception: The value cannot be represented as a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonElement GetProperty(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> utf8PropertyName) cil managed
Public Function GetProperty (utf8PropertyName As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)) As JsonElement

Docs.param: The UTF-8 representation (with no Byte-Order-Mark (BOM)) of the name of the property to return.
Docs.summary: Gets a representing the value of a required property identified by .
Docs.returns: A representing the value of the requested property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison.
If a property is defined multiple times for the same object, the method matches the last such definition.

Docs.exception: No property was found with the requested name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

Docs.summary: Gets a string representation for the current value appropriate to the value type.
Docs.returns: A string representation for the current value appropriate to the value type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
For <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonValueKind.Null?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
For <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonValueKind.True?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
For <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonValueKind.False?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
For <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonValueKind.String?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the value of <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonElement.GetString> is returned.
For other types, the value of <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonElement.GetRawText> is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetByte([out] unsigned int8& value) cil managed
Public Function TryGetByte (ByRef value As Byte) As Boolean

Docs.param: When the method returns, contains the byte equivalent of the current JSON number if the conversion succeeded.
Docs.summary: Attempts to represent the current JSON number as a .
Docs.returns: if the number can be represented as a ; otherwise.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This method does not parse the contents of a JSON string value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetBytesFromBase64([out] unsigned int8[]& value) cil managed
Public Function TryGetBytesFromBase64 (ByRef value As Byte()) As Boolean

Docs.param: If the method succeeds, contains the decoded binary representation of the Base64 text.
Docs.summary: Attempts to represent the current JSON string as a byte array, assuming that it is Base64 encoded.
Docs.returns: if the entire token value is encoded as valid Base64 text and can be successfully decoded to bytes. otherwise.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This method does not create a byte array representation of values other than Base64 encoded JSON strings.

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains the decimal equivalent of the current JSON number.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetDouble([out] float64& value) cil managed
Public Function TryGetDouble (ByRef value As Double) As Boolean

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains a double-precision floating point value equivalent to the current JSON number.
Docs.summary: Attempts to represent the current JSON number as a .
Docs.returns: if the number can be represented as a , otherwise.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This method does not parse the contents of a JSON string value.
On .NET Core, this method does not return `false` for values larger than <xref:System.Double.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or smaller than <xref:System.Double.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>. Instead, it returns <see langword="true> and assigns <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> to `value`.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryGetProperty (ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8PropertyName, out System.Text.Json.JsonElement value);
.method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetProperty(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> utf8PropertyName, [out] valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonElement& value) cil managed
Public Function TryGetProperty (utf8PropertyName As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), ByRef value As JsonElement) As Boolean
public: bool TryGetProperty(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> utf8PropertyName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Text::Json::JsonElement % value);

Docs.param: The UTF-8 (with no Byte-Order-Mark (BOM)) representation of the name of the property to return.
Receives the value of the located property.
Docs.summary: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists. When the property exists, the method assigns its value to the argument.
Docs.returns: if the property was found, otherwise.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison.
If a property is defined multiple times for the same object, the method matches the last such definition.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryGetProperty (ReadOnlySpan<char> propertyName, out System.Text.Json.JsonElement value);

public: bool TryGetProperty(ReadOnlySpan<char> propertyName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Text::Json::JsonElement % value);

Docs.param: The name of the property to find.
When this method returns, contains the value of the specified property.
Docs.summary: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists. When the property exists, the method assigns its value to the argument.
Docs.returns: if the property was found, otherwise.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison.
If a property is defined multiple times for the same object, the method matches the last such definition.

When this method returns, contains the value of the specified property.
Docs.summary: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists. When the property exists, its value is assigned to the argument.

Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ValueEquals(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> utf8Text) cil managed
Public Function ValueEquals (utf8Text As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)) As Boolean

Docs.param: The UTF-8 encoded text to compare against.
Docs.summary: Compares the text represented by a UTF8-encoded byte span to the string value of this element.
Docs.returns: if the string value of this element has the same UTF-8 encoding as ; otherwise.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This method is functionally equal to doing an ordinal comparison of the string produced by UTF-8 decoding `utf8Text` with the result of calling <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonElement.GetString>, but avoids creating the string instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ValueEquals(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<char> text) cil managed
Public Function ValueEquals (text As ReadOnlySpan(Of Char)) As Boolean

Docs.param: The text to compare against.
Docs.summary: Compares a specified read-only character span to the string value of this element.
Docs.returns: if the string value of this element matches ; otherwise.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This method is functionally equal to doing an ordinal comparison of `text` and the result of calling <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonElement.GetString>, but avoids creating the string instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ValueEquals(string text) cil managed
Public Function ValueEquals (text As String) As Boolean

Docs.param: The text to compare against.
Docs.summary: Compares a specified string to the string value of this element.
Docs.returns: if the string value of this element matches ; otherwise.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This method is functionally equal to doing an ordinal comparison of `text` and the result of calling <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonElement.GetString>, but avoids creating the string instance.
